FlowGraph

Class DefaultNodeRenderer

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

Default node renderer that creates a standard bordered box with text. Supports inline label editing via IEditableNodeRenderer.

public class DefaultNodeRenderer : IEditableNodeRenderer, INodeRenderer
Inheritance
object
